(2075x1+0)/1 mod 8192 = 2075. (2075x3+1)/2 mod 4096 = 3113. (2075x9+5)/4 mod 2048 = 574. (2075x9+5)/8 mod 1024 = 287. (2075x27+23)/16 mod 512 = 431. (2075x81+85)/32 mod 256 = 135. (2075x243+287)/64 mod 128 = 75. (2075x729+925)/128 mod 64 = 49. (2075x2187+2903)/256 mod 32 = 10. (2075x2187+2903)/512 mod 16 = 5. (2075x6561+9221)/1024 mod 8 = 0. (2075x6561+9221)/2048 mod 4 = 0. (2075x6561+9221)/4096 mod 2 = 0. (2075x6561+9221)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
